Merge_MN.display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s. Recharge: Long

Merge_Middle_MN.display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s.

Merge_LT.display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s. Recharge: Long

Merge_Middle_LT.display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s.

Merge_BS.display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s. Recharge: Long

Merge_Middle_BS.display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s.

Possession.display_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.
Possession.display_target_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.

Touch_of_Fear.display_help: The horrific collection of castoff spirits that make up a Fearsome Reflection are capable of disabling prey with their Touch of Fear.
Touch_of_Fear.display_target_help: The horrific collection of castoff spirits that make up a Fearsome Reflection are capable of disabling prey with their Touch of Fear.

Possession.display_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.
Possession.display_target_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.

Hateful_Burst.display_help: You unleash a bolt of pure hatred at your target. The target suffers lethal damage and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their damage output.
Hateful_Burst.display_target_help: Your damage output has been reduced for all damage types.

Wrathful_Infusion.display_help: You create a prison of suffering around your target, crushing their very soul with your overwhelming hatred. The target is enraged, forcing them to attack you, and suffers negative energy damage.
Wrathful_Infusion.display_target_help: You are held and taking damage over time.
Wrathful_Infusion.display_target_short_help: DoT (Negative Energy), Chance for DoT (Lethal), Held

Crushing_Hate.display_help: You create a prison of suffering around your target, crushing their very soul with your overwhelming hatred. The target is held in place and suffers negative energy damage. The force of the hatred is so enormous that this power also has the potential to manifest with lethal damage.
Crushing_Hate.display_target_help: You are held and taking damage over time.
Crushing_Hate.display_target_short_help: DoT (Negative Energy), Chance for DoT (Lethal), Held

Dissipate.display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!
Dissipate.display_target_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

Hateful_Gloom.display_help: You unleash a barrage of pure misery at your target. The target suffers lethal damage and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their damage output.
Hateful_Gloom.display_target_help: Your damage output has been reduced for all damage types.

Weaken_Resolve.display_help: You strike at your target with depression made manifest, causing negative energy damage and dampening their ability to move via any means.
Weaken_Resolve.display_target_help: You ability to run, jump and fly has been compromised!

Baleful_Thrash.display_help: You create a whip of hatred, sweeping it in a wide cone. This causes negative energy damage to enemies and reduces their damage output. The whip's wounds manifest physically, causing bleeding, but there is a chance that the force of the strike could also inflict lethal damage.
Baleful_Thrash.display_short_help: Short Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Negative Energy/Lethal), DoT (Lethal), -DMG (All)
Baleful_Thrash.display_target_help: Your damage output has been reduced and you are bleeding.

Aura_of_Aggression.display_help: You strike at your target with pure aggression, causing negative energy damage and reducing the speed at which their powers recharge.
Aura_of_Aggression.display_target_help: Your powers are recharging more slowly.

Aura_of_Possession.display_help: You are possessed by an Apparition!
Aura_of_Possession.display_target_help: You are possessed by an Apparition!

Aura_of_Possession.display_help: You are possessed by an Apparition!
Aura_of_Possession.display_target_help: You are possessed by an Apparition!

Emerge_MN.display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!
Emerge_MN.display_target_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

Emerge_LT.display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!
Emerge_LT.display_target_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

Emerge_BS.display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!
Emerge_BS.display_target_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

Damage_MN.display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.
Damage_MN.display_target_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

Damage_LT.display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.
Damage_LT.display_target_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

Damage_BS.display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.
Damage_BS.display_target_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

Damage_EB.display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.
Damage_EB.display_target_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

Damage_AV.display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.
Damage_AV.display_target_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

Status_All.display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. In addition to the standard resistances exhibited by others of their kind, merged forms and more powerful Apparitions have resistance to being held, slept or confused.
Status_All.display_target_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. In addition to the standard resistances exhibited by others of their kind, merged forms and more powerful Apparitions have resistance to being held, slept or confused.

Crushing_Hate.display_help: You create a prison of suffering around your target, crushing their very soul with your overwhelming hatred. The target is held in place and suffers negative energy damage. The force of the hatred is so enormous that this power also has the potential to manifest with lethal damage.
Crushing_Hate.display_target_help: You are held and taking damage over time.
Crushing_Hate.display_target_short_help: DoT (Negative Energy), Chance for DoT (Lethal), Held

Collective_Unconscious.display_help: You can tap into the collective unconscious to empower nearby Apparitions.
Collective_Unconscious.display_target_help: You are empowered by the collective unconscious of the Apparitions.

Dissipate.display_help: More powerful Apparitions do not simply fade away upon defeat. Instead, they have a small chance of lingering on as a Fractured Apparition.
Dissipate.display_target_help: More powerful Apparitions do not simply fade away upon defeat. Instead, they have a small chance of lingering on as a Fractured Apparition.

Enraged_Regeneration.display_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.
Enraged_Regeneration.display_target_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.

Attract.display_help: The raw hatred emanating from an Enraged Spectre serves as a beacon for lesser Spirits, bringing them to the assistance of the Spectre.
Attract.display_target_help: The raw hatred emanating from an Enraged Spectre serves as a beacon for lesser Spirits, bringing them to the assistance of the Spectre.

Possess.display_help: An Enraged Spectre is too strong to simply be defeated. As a last strike against their enemies, the Spectre reaches out and possesses an enemy, causing confusion.
Possess.display_target_help: You have been possessed and are confused!

Explosive_Rage.display_help: You launch coalesced rage at your target. Upon contact, this erupts in a small area, causing negative energy and lethal damage to those caught in the burst, as well as reducing their damage output.
Explosive_Rage.display_target_help: Your damage output has been reduced for all damage types.

Hateful_Blast.display_help: You unleash a bolt of pure hatred at your target. The target suffers lethal damage and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their damage output.
Hateful_Blast.display_target_help: Your damage output has been reduced for all damage types.

Wrathful_Siphon.display_help: You direct unrelenting anger at your target, causing them to panic. This causes them to suffer lethal and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in the effectiveness of all status-altering powers. Some of the damage done is returned to you as healing.
Wrathful_Siphon.display_target_help: The effectiveness of your status-altering powers has been reduced!

Baleful_Lash.display_help: You channel negative energy into a whip and Lash out at your foe, dealing damage and causing bleeding. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks, will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Baleful_Lash.display_short_help: Close, Moderate DMG(Negative Energy), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Res (All), Knockdown
Baleful_Lash.display_target_help: Your damage resistance has been reduced and you are bleeding.

Wrathful_Strike.display_help: You direct unrelenting anger into a melee attack. This attack deals smashing and negative energy damage to your target, but will occasionally strike with such force that your target is knocked down or knocked back.
Wrathful_Strike.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smash/Negative Energy), Chance for Knockdown and Knockback
Wrathful_Strike.display_target_help: You have been knocked off your feet!
